That's how we got this whole system out of the way.

Question: Why do you care about my opinion? Answer 'Because my family is too bad.'

Answer: You could have an honest conversation and then go back

Outside of my apartment and in his own house.

The only time that I know that you came was to talk to your sister-in-law.

You may have been a "fake" during the last two weeks.
